attributes.review: AS SOON AS I OPENED THE APP IT ASKED FOR MY PHONE NUMBER. IT THEN REPEATEDLY SENT ME TEXT MESSAGES ASKING FOR CAMPAIGN DONATIONS. WHEN I DONATED THROUGH THE APP THE TEXT MESSAGES CAME FASTER . I NOTICED THAT IT WAS CHARGING  CREDIT CARD FOR EVERY TEXT MESSAGE THAT IT SENT ME!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. IT IS A SCAM AND IT SELLS YOUR INFORMATION!. I HAD TO RESET MY FACEBOOK  BECAUSE IT HACKED IT. DO NOT FALL FOR THIS FAKE APP. IT IS FAKE NEWS!! I THINK CNN MADE THIS AS A DECOY!!
attributes.title: THIS APP STEALS YOUR CREDIT CARD INFORMATION
